The Alphablocks love having a race and seeing who can make the fastest words!

The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  

The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

#LearningBlocks #Numberblocks #Alphablocks

Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  

The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

Follow number fifteen & other cool numbers in this video!

Subscribe for more Alphablocks and Numberblocks: https://goo.gl/zknx9d
The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.
#LearningBlocks #Numberblocks #Alphablocks

In this video the Numberblocks are counting all the way up! See how far up you can count to?!

The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  

The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

Alphablock Q sings a song about how much Alphablock U means to them!

The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  

The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.

Subscribe for more Alphablocks and Numberblocks: https://goo.gl/zknx9d
The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.
#LearningBlocks #Numberblocks #Alphablocks

Subscribe for more Alphablocks and Numberblocks: https://goo.gl/zknx9d
The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.
#LearningBlocks #Numberblocks #Alphablocks

As seen on CBeebies! Watch full episodes on BBC iPlayer: https://bbc.in/2OLEvWf
Subscribe for more Alphablocks and Numberblocks: https://goo.gl/zknx9d
The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.
#LearningBlocks #Numberblocks #Alphablocks

Subscribe for more Alphablocks and Numberblocks: https://goo.gl/zknx9d
The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.  
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.
#LearningBlocks #Numberblocks #Alphablocks

Welcome to the Learning Blocks channel - the home of all things Numberblocks and Alphablocks! Here you can enjoy both of your favourite CBeebies shows in one place. Learn to read and count, all while having tonnes of fun with the Blocks!
The Numberblocks are little blocks with big ideas, having a ton of number fun! Learn how to add, subtract and count in a fun and educational way using singular blocks to do basic maths sums. They play games and sing songs about how easy it is to count! Numberblocks is a hit CBeebies show that is teaching children around the world how to count with easy to more advanced levels of numeracy for children.
The Alphablocks are 26 living letters who discover that whenever they hold hands and make a word, something magical happens. With adventures, songs and silliness, it‚Äôs tons of fun with words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills. Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs already helped hundreds of thousands of children to learn to read and will bring phonics to life for anyone wishing to learn how to spell in English.
